snippet.title: The Encounter(接触), A Horror Game, a story of a Chinese family inexplicably disappeared in 1999.
snippet.description:
Hello everyone, we are RedDoorStudio, and we have always been very interested in exploring events such as dark matter, dimensions, multi-dimensional space, parallel worlds, matrices, UFOs, aliens, etc. We have always wanted to turn our ideas into games. Now we have brought our new game and our first work "Contact". We hope everyone can enjoy it! We also welcome everyone to share their ideas in the official QQ group of the game. In the following projects, we may adopt your opinions. Let's learn and explore together!
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2498580/The_Encounter/?beta=1
Official QQ Group：
878740232 
805714158
1159069
大家好，我们是红门游戏工作室（RedDoorStudio）， 一直以来，我们对探索暗物质、异次元、多维空间、平行世界、矩阵、UFO、外星人等事件非常感兴趣，也一直想要把我们的想法做成游戏， 现在我们带来了一款我们全新的游戏，也是我们的第一个作品《接触》，  希望大家能够喜欢！ 也欢迎大家能把自己的想法在游戏官方QQ群沟通，在接下来的项目里我们或许会采纳您的意见，让我们一起学习和探索吧！
官方QQ群：
878740232 
805714158
11590691
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2498580/The_Encounter/?beta=1
